data.text:
It had been a while since Inari One came to Tracen 
Academy and started training. I was amazed by 
how fast Inari One was growing stronger―
data.processed:
󠁿It had been a while since Inari One came to Tracen 
󠁿Academy and started training. I was amazed by 
󠁿how fast Inari One was growing stronger―

data.text:
Did ya see that, Boss!? 
I reduced my time a～gain!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Did ya see that, Boss!? 
󠁿I reduced my time a～gain!

data.text:
Did ya see that, Boss!? 
I reduced my time a～gain!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Did ya see that, Boss!? 
󠁿I reduced my time a～gain!

data.text:
With just a bit of time in the gym, and addin' a little bit more 
weight, to think the results would be like this…… Hehee, howzzat!?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿With just a bit of time in the gym, and addin' a little bit more 
󠁿weight, to think the results would be like this…… Hehee, howzzat!?

data.text:
When I'm runnin', there were times where even if I used power my 
speed wouldn't increase, but with Boss' advice, look at me now!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿When I'm runnin', there were times where even if I used power my 
󠁿speed wouldn't increase, but with Boss' advice, look at me now!

data.text:
When I'm runnin', there were times where even if I used power my 
speed wouldn't increase, but with Boss' advice, look at me now!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿When I'm runnin', there were times where even if I used power my 
󠁿speed wouldn't increase, but with Boss' advice, look at me now!

data.text:
That my speed would start slippin' like that, it all makes sense 
now! Man, that's impressive!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿That my speed would start slippin' like that, it all makes sense 
󠁿now! Man, that's impressive!

data.text:
Hahaa, ya don't need to be so humble! C'mon, be proud about that. 
See, even the sun in the sky agrees with me!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Hahaa, ya don't need to be so humble! C'mon, be proud about that. 
󠁿See, even the sun in the sky agrees with me!

data.text:
In Oi, learnin' strength, and at Tracen learnin' 
precision……kaaaaa～!! Bein' able to experience both, I'm really 
lucky, huh!? Right!?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿In Oi, learnin' strength, and at Tracen learnin' 
󠁿precision……kaaaaa～!! Bein' able to experience both, I'm really 
󠁿lucky, huh!? Right!?

data.text:
――Speaking of Oi, I'd heard from Inari One that the one that 
pushed her forward to accept being scouted was her 『Chief』 in Oi.
data.processed:
󠁿――Speaking of Oi, I'd heard from Inari One that the one that 
󠁿pushed her forward to accept being scouted was her 『Chief』 in Oi.

data.text:
Hm? Yeah, I've heard from all the other followers that he's doing 
well. I haven't really been contactin' him myself, ya see?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Hm? Yeah, I've heard from all the other followers that he's doing 
󠁿well. I haven't really been contactin' him myself, ya see?

data.text:
It's the Chief after all, if I contacted him for every little 
thing, he'd probably get mad and say somethin' like 『Are ya some 
kind of fledglin' that can never leave the nest!?』
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿It's the Chief after all, if I contacted him for every little 
󠁿thing, he'd probably get mad and say somethin' like 『Are ya some 
󠁿kind of fledglin' that can never leave the nest!?』

data.text:
He was the one that pushed me forward after all, I need to show 
him I can stand on my own! I need to be able to do that much if I 
want to make some big waves!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿He was the one that pushed me forward after all, I need to show 
󠁿him I can stand on my own! I need to be able to do that much if I 
󠁿want to make some big waves!

data.text: Alright, I'm goin' for one more!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: 󠁿Alright, I'm goin' for one more!

data.text:
――The training was, by no means, easy. However, 
Inari One was always facing the challenge with 
a positive attitude and a cheerful laugh.
data.processed:
󠁿――The training was, by no means, easy. However, 
󠁿Inari One was always facing the challenge with 
󠁿a positive attitude and a cheerful laugh.

data.text:
There's probably plenty of things she's still getting accustomed 
to. But, she's never complained.
data.processed:
󠁿There's probably plenty of things she's still getting accustomed 
󠁿to. But, she's never complained.

data.text: Before seriously starting her training, Inari One had said it.
data.processed: 󠁿Before seriously starting her training, Inari One had said it.

data.text:
It's probably not my place to be sayin' this to you, Boss. But, 
I'm serious. I didn't come here with any half-hearted feelings.
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿It's probably not my place to be sayin' this to you, Boss. But, 
󠁿I'm serious. I didn't come here with any half-hearted feelings.

data.text:
It's probably not my place to be sayin' this to you, Boss. But, 
I'm serious. I didn't come here with any half-hearted feelings.
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿It's probably not my place to be sayin' this to you, Boss. But, 
󠁿I'm serious. I didn't come here with any half-hearted feelings.

data.text:
You get it right? Lukewarm water is pretty useless! So don't hold 
back, come at me hard!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿You get it right? Lukewarm water is pretty useless! So don't hold 
󠁿back, come at me hard!

data.text:
This Inari One, since I came to plant my flag here, I've got no 
choice but to keep goin'!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿This Inari One, since I came to plant my flag here, I've got no 
󠁿choice but to keep goin'!

data.text: The Twinkle Series…… on this big stage, I came here to win!!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: 󠁿The Twinkle Series…… on this big stage, I came here to win!!

data.text:
And just like she proclaimed, Inari One earnestly faced her 
training, day after day, and she's growing. Even if――
data.processed:
󠁿And just like she proclaimed, Inari One earnestly faced her 
󠁿training, day after day, and she's growing. Even if――

data.text:
Haa, Haa, haa…… huu…… haa…… 
……Hehehee. Howzzat, Boss!? That run just now!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Haa, Haa, haa…… huu…… haa…… 
󠁿……Hehehee. Howzzat, Boss!? That run just now!

data.text:
Haa, Haa, haa…… huu…… haa…… 
……Hehehee. Howzzat, Boss!? That run just now!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Haa, Haa, haa…… huu…… haa…… 
󠁿……Hehehee. Howzzat, Boss!? That run just now!

data.text: Even if that was something incredibly difficult――
data.processed: 󠁿Even if that was something incredibly difficult――

data.text: No problem! Something like this is a piece of cake.
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: 󠁿No problem! Something like this is a piece of cake.

data.text:
Just like she ran for me that one time, before being trained, she 
laughed it off as if it was nothing.
data.processed:
󠁿Just like she ran for me that one time, before being trained, she 
󠁿laughed it off as if it was nothing.

data.text:
Hm? What's wrong, Boss? You've got 
a real serious look on your face――
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Hm? What's wrong, Boss? You've got 
󠁿a real serious look on your face――

data.text:
Hm? What's wrong, Boss? You've got 
a real serious look on your face――
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Hm? What's wrong, Boss? You've got 
󠁿a real serious look on your face――

data.text: Heh?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: 󠁿Heh?

data.text:
I don't want to betray the expectations of Inari 
One, who came here because she believed in me. I'll 
make sure she doesn't regret coming here.
data.processed:
󠁿I don't want to betray the expectations of Inari 
󠁿One, who came here because she believed in me. I'll 
󠁿make sure she doesn't regret coming here.

data.text:
For the sake of 『Stirrin' things up』, Inari One had already 
decided to make the effort.
data.processed:
󠁿For the sake of 『Stirrin' things up』, Inari One had already 
󠁿decided to make the effort.

data.text:
Hahaa, what's up with that!? 
Ya sure know what to say, don't ya!?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Hahaa, what's up with that!? 
󠁿Ya sure know what to say, don't ya!?

data.text:
Yeah, leave it to me! I'll prove to everyone in Japan that the 
Boss' eyes weren't wrong!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah, leave it to me! I'll prove to everyone in Japan that the 
󠁿Boss' eyes weren't wrong!

data.text:
Yeah, leave it to me! I'll prove to everyone in Japan that the 
Boss' eyes weren't wrong!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah, leave it to me! I'll prove to everyone in Japan that the 
󠁿Boss' eyes weren't wrong!

data.text:
With a slap on my back, it felt like she 
was trying to help raise my spirit too.
data.processed:
󠁿With a slap on my back, it felt like she 
󠁿was trying to help raise my spirit too.

data.text:
……Huu. Glad they scouted me, huh? Expectations……no, 
trust maybe? Hehee.
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿……Huu. Glad they scouted me, huh? Expectations……no, 
󠁿trust maybe? Hehee.

data.text:
(Since comin' here, I can tell I've been getting stronger. ……and 
I'll definitely get stronger from here on out)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿(Since comin' here, I can tell I've been getting stronger. ……and 
󠁿I'll definitely get stronger from here on out)

data.text:
Just leave it to me. Chief, the followers……and Boss! I'll run to 
the ends of the Earth!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Just leave it to me. Chief, the followers……and Boss! I'll run to 
󠁿the ends of the Earth!

data.text:
Just leave it to me. Chief, the followers……and Boss! I'll run to 
the ends of the Earth!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Just leave it to me. Chief, the followers……and Boss! I'll run to 
󠁿the ends of the Earth!

data.text:
I'll run and run, as far as I can, and smash through any 
obstacles in my way!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿I'll run and run, as far as I can, and smash through any 
󠁿obstacles in my way!

title: Someday, The Edo Flowers Will Bloom
